The user sends a huge rock at the opponent, causing them to fall back.

== Trivia ==
* Depending on how it is written, "dangan" can mean either {{translation|"bullet, shot, shell"|弾丸}} or {{translation|"precipice, cliff"|断岩}}.

[[pt-br:Estilo Terra: Técnica da Bomba de Rocha]]
